Basic Attack

Standard

The ancient copper dragon shifts 2 squares before and after making the attack. Reach 2

+32 vs AC; 2d10+10 damage plus 4d6 acid damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+32 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The ancient copper dragon makes two claw attacks and then shifts 3 squares.

At-Will

Standard

The ancient copper dragon flies 16 squares and makes a melee basic attack against each of two different targets at any point during that movement. The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when moving away from the targets

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a space where it flanks the ancient copper dragon, at-will

+32 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage, and the copper dragon shifts 4 squares.

Recharge 4-6 âœ¦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+28 vs Reflex; 4d10+8 acid damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the ancient copper dragon uses it

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +28 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the ancient copper dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
An ancient copper dragon makes saving throws against immobilized, slowed, and restrained conditions at the start of its turn as well as at the end of its turn.
